Title: Skills Undervalued Fast
Content: "I dunno Photoshop but for you it takes 1 min." This dismisses your expertise. RED FLAG.

Title: Signed Not Read
Content: "Yes, I signed the agreement but I didn't read it!" They won’t honor terms. RED FLAG.

Title: Geographic Name Drop
Content: "This is Bali Rokma." Irrelevant flex or pressure tactic. RED FLAG.

Title: Conditional Payment Pressure
Content: "I'll pay you when I see the website online and working"—after agreeing otherwise. RED FLAG.

Title: Scope Creep Attempt
Content: "I know this isn’t included in our agreement, but I need you to..." RED FLAG.

Title: Quick Change Trap
Content: "Can we just make a few quick changes?" Always more than it sounds. RED FLAG.

Title: Minimized Workload Warning
Content: "This should just be a quick one." Downplays real effort. RED FLAG.

Title: Last-Minute Meeting
Content: Requesting meetings on very short notice (like same-day). It disrespects your schedule. RED FLAG.

Title: Ghosting Mid-Project
Content: Client goes silent after leaving requests. Communication breakdown. RED FLAG.

Title: Upfront Bargaining Issue
Content: Clients haggling over your 50% upfront—this hints at future payment problems. RED FLAG.

Title: Exposure Over Budget
Content: "There’s no budget for this, but a lot of people will see it." Empty promises. RED FLAG.

Title: Fake Family Vibes
Content: "We're all family here." Often used to exploit emotional labor and skip fair pay. RED FLAG.

Title: Same Ambition, Less
Content: "Budget's been cut, but the ambition stays the same." You’ll do more for less. RED FLAG.

Title: Silent For Weeks
Content: Client stops responding for days or weeks. Lack of reliability. RED FLAG.

Title: No Mention Money
Content: Project briefs with deadlines and steps but zero mention of budget. RED FLAG.

Title: Unpaid Pitch Request
Content: Client demands unpaid work just to 'win' the job. Free labor is not okay. RED FLAG.

Title: Signed-Off Revisions
Content: Last-minute changes to things they already approved? That’s unstable scope. RED FLAG.

Title: Payment Cycle Risks
Content: In the West, anything taking longer than 30 days to pay? Headaches. In the East, anything not Upfront, sketchy, mind your steps. RED FLAG.

Title: Extra Hours Unpaid
Content: Expecting you to put in extra time without reward or acknowledgment. RED FLAG.

Title: Team Budget Cuts
Content: Trying to save money by skipping key hires (like stylists or models). You’ll be overextended. RED FLAG.
